content: I think I'll start by gathering all the necessary documents and information about the property, including the deed, survey map, and any existing infrastructure. I'll also research the local market and gather data on recent sales of similar properties in the area. Additionally, I'll make a list of questions to ask the appraiser, such as their experience with land valuation and their methodology for determining value. Finally, I'll ask them about their timeline and fees for the appraisal.
